sentences.english: Is Chenglong one of the most popular actors?
sentences.chinese: 成龍是最受歡迎的電影演員之一嗎？

sentences.english: I don't really feel I belong in the movies.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得自己不適宜於當電影演員。

sentences.english: But being pigeonholed as a gay film actor is kind of weird for me.
sentences.chinese: 但作爲一個同志電影演員是很怪的我束之高閣。

sentences.english: The movie star just his movie.
sentences.chinese: 這位著名的電影演員剛拍完電影。

sentences.english: She becomes an Oscar-winning film actress, and self-destructive addict.
sentences.chinese: 她成爲一個奧斯卡獎電影演員和自我毀滅的吸毒者。

sentences.english: The film actress gave up her career and married.
sentences.chinese: 那位女電影演員放棄事業而結婚了。

sentences.english: Kaveri Jha is an Indian Telugu cinema actress.
sentences.chinese: 卡弗裏傑哈是印度泰盧固語電影演員。
